en.welcome_message: Welcome to our simple tool/game page.
en.qr_copy_alert: QR code content copied to clipboard!
en.qr_copy_fail: Failed to copy. Please check permissions.
en.qr_no_camera_alert: No available cameras. Please check camera permissions.
en.qr_camera_error_alert: Camera error. Please allow camera access in browser settings.
en.draw_app_subtitle: Upload 4 face photos and select your desired style to create amazing caricatures!  (Not saved!)
en.draw_upload_info: Uploading photos from various angles of the same person results in more accurate caricatures. Supports JPG, PNG files (max 10MB each)
en.draw_error_max_files: You can select up to 4 photos only.
en.draw_error_file_size: File size is too large. Each file must be under 10MB.
en.draw_error_generation_failed: An error occurred during caricature generation:
en.draw_error_timeout: Timeout: Image generation is taking too long.
en.portal_app_subtitle: Turn your imagination into reality with cutting-edge AI technology. From caricatures to style transformations, all image creation tools in one place
en.draw_app_description: A portal site providing various AI image tools including AI-based image generation, caricature creation, face analysis, and style transformation
en.whoareyou_title: Who Are You? - AI Face Analysis
en.whoareyou_subtitle: Your AI-powered face analysis report - Upload a photo and experience amazing analysis!
en.whoareyou_upload_info: Click to select a photo or drag and drop to upload
en.whoareyou_file_info: Only JPG, PNG files are supported (max 5MB)
en.whoareyou_wait_message: Please wait. Working hard to provide the best analysis!
en.whoareyou_analysis_subtitle: Your characteristics and charm analyzed by AI
en.gomoku_subtitle: Play Gomoku online with friends! Connect via WebRTC and enjoy lag-free gameplay
